```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidygraph)
library(igraph)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggraph)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r}
readRDS("Dados/likes.rds")
```


```{r}
g <- 
  likes |>
  select(from.actor, to.actor) |> 
  as.data.frame() |> 
  graph_from_data_frame(directed = TRUE)

```
  
  
```{r}

g_tbl <- as_tbl_graph(g) |>
  mutate(deg = centrality_degree()) 

ggraph(g_tbl, layout = "fr") +
  geom_edge_link(alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_node_point(aes(size = deg)) +
  theme_void()

```
  
  
```{r}

g <- graph_from_adjacency_matrix(
  matriz_likes,
  mode = "directed",
  weighted = TRUE
)

plot(g)


```
